data.meanings: free from wants, having no wants, in a state of competence or sufficiency or rich or wealthy; dwelt, abode; sing, chanted; eulogized, satirized
data.sentence: The word يُغْنِي comes from the root غ ن ي and is associated with the meanings: free from wants, having no wants, in a state of competence or sufficiency or rich or wealthy; dwelt, abode; sing, chanted; eulogized, satirized

data.meanings: To be abundant in weath, possess an abundance of property.
data.sentence: The word مَالُهُ comes from the root م و ل and is associated with the meanings: To be abundant in weath, possess an abundance of property.

data.meanings: to perish, fall down, break, knock, blandish, destroy. arda (vb. 4) - to bring to destruction/ruin. tradda - to fall. mutarddiyatun - that which falls, which is slain by a fall.
data.sentence: The word تَرَدَّى comes from the root ر د ي and is associated with the meanings: to perish, fall down, break, knock, blandish, destroy. arda (vb. 4) - to bring to destruction/ruin. tradda - to fall. mutarddiyatun - that which falls, which is slain by a fall.
